You showed up at the perfect time.$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/move farmer 1 0 0 true/faceDirection Robin 0/pause 200/speak Robin "It's our new 'Special Orders' board./pause 400/faceDirection Robin 0/speak Robin "Now, let me explain..."/showFrame Robin 20/speak Robin "You see... with %farm Farm back in business, the local economy has really been picking up.#$b#As a result, some of the local townsfolk have been asking me for a way to source local ingredients for their businesses or personal projects."/pause 200/showFrame Robin 8/faceDirection Robin 0/speak Robin "So, Robin and I came up with the idea of a new 'Special Orders' board, where people can post bigger jobs than would make sense for the old billboard outside the general store."/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 3/move Robin 0 1 3/speak Robin "Yeah... for example, I plan on requesting some hardwood for a bed I want to make.$h#$b#I won't put you on the spot, but if you want to help me out you can just accept the job from this board.#$b#Who knows, maybe if the bed turns out well I'll start selling them in my shop!$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/quickQuestion #I look forward to helping!#Heh... I dunno... we'll see...(break)faceDirection Robin 3\speak Robin "I thought so! I wouldn't expect anything less from you, @."\emote Robin 20\speak Robin "So, can we say that you're... --On Board--?$4"\pause 400\showFrame Robin 27\shake Robin 200\pause 400\textAboveHead Robin "*groan*"\animate Robin false true 150 32 33\pause 1200\showFrame Robin 0\faceDirection Robin 3\speak Robin "Well, I'm sure you're busy, so we won't keep you away from your work any longer.#$b#As always, I appreciate your willingness to contribute!$h#$b#Take care, @."(break)faceDirection Robin 3\emote Robin 28\speak Robin "Huh... I wouldn't expect such a tepid response from you, @. I'm disappointed.$s"\pause 400\speak Robin "It's fine... there's no pressure to help out.$5#$b#Maybe I can get someone else to help. Krobus could use something to do outside of the sewer."\playMusic none\pause 500\speak Robin "Hmmph... Well, I'm done here.$u#$b#...Wouldn't want to waste any more of @'s precious 'me' time.$u"\faceDirection Robin 1(break)/pause 2000/end
